imdb.title: Alice to Zouroku
imdb.plot: The story centers on a little girl called Sana, who is one of the children that holds the power of "Alice's Dream", an ability that enables her to materialize anything she imagines. After escaping a lab where she was a test subjec...

episodes.title: The Red Queen Escapes
episodes.plot: After entering the outside world for the first time, Sana arrives at the bustling district of Kabukicho in Tokyo's Shinjuku Ward. In a convenience store there, she meets Kashimura Zoroku, the quintessential "stubborn old man."

episodes.title: Dreams of Alice
episodes.plot: Since Sana had nowhere to go, Zoroku decided to let her stay in his own home for the time being. After he finds out that the previous day's incident isn't being covered by any media, he makes a call to an old friend.

episodes.title: Cards
episodes.plot: Kashimura Floral is in an uproar after Sana uses her Dream of Alice, suddenly landing herself and Sanae in the shop. Even after things quiet down, Zoroku scolds Sana for breaking her promise not to use her power.

episodes.title: Something Not Human
episodes.plot: Minnie C and her group took advantage of a moment's negligence to kidnap Sana. Left behind at his office, Zoroku demands answers from Naito as to just what Sana really is.

episodes.title: A Home to Return To
episodes.plot: When Sana and Zoroku are loaded onto a cargo ship, the ones who appear to rescue them are Cabinet Information Research Office agents Ichijo Shizuku and Yamada Noriko.

episodes.title: The Kashimura Family
episodes.plot: The seasons have quickly turned to winter. The matter of the research facility has been resolved, and life is normal again in Zoroku's household. Sana seems to have fully adjusted to being a member of the Kashimura family, as well.

episodes.title: Friends
episodes.plot: Zoroku is making a trip to Yokohama to meet a client, so he takes Sana with him. Accompanied by Ichijo, Sana is impressed by the sight of the ocean and the robot-operated factory that she visits, and enjoys her day out to the fullest.

episodes.title: The Evil Witch
episodes.plot: Shikishima Hatori, a completely ordinary girl, mysteriously develops a "Dream of Alice" power. Hatori prays that her parents will stop fighting over her future, but her wish is realized in a way she never expected.

episodes.title: Where the Cheshire Cat Smiles
episodes.plot: Sana collapses after meeting Hatori and Ayumu, and Asahi and Yonaga bring her back to Zoroku's house. The three girls have a great time playing together, until Sana comes up with a plan to teach Hatori a lesson for what she did to Zoroku.

episodes.title: The Little Queen
episodes.plot: After a discussion with Ayumu, Sana lures Hatori into Wonderland to see just how evil this "witch" really is.

episodes.title: The Queen and the Witch
episodes.plot: A collision with a "Dream of Alice" power has left Sana and Hatori trapped in the deepest part of Wonderland, without any signs for an exit.

episodes.title: I'm Home
episodes.plot: Ten days have passed in the outside world since Sana and Hatori got trapped in Wonderland. Ayumu, remembering a promise they once made, begins to worry that Hatori won't ever come back.
